EmailInputEdit:
You can add a lab from the communicate portal https://portal.3shapecommunicate.com/login, and by reloading the software will show you the new connection, remmeber this connection is going to be visible once the Laboratory accept your request

If this doesnt work, please follow the steps below to connect to another lab in the future:



1. Go to ‘Labs’ and search for the lab in the search field (email).


2. Once you have found the lab, click ‘Install’.


3. You have now triggered a connection request which will have to be approved by the lab.


4. Once the lab has approved your request to connect, the status on the lab will change from ‘pending’ to ‘installed’.
HJ: No helpjuice used, as no article found for this proccess
Issue: the connection not visible on the software, and the request to add a laboratory
Probing Questions (Add Info): No further cases in the last month for the same issue.
RC: The approval has not been accepted
Solution: Guided on how to refresh  the software when the connection has been approved
Step 1: On Communicate the request is done, advised to customer that needs to be approve in order to see it on the software
